caption.title: Univariate analysis of socio-demographic characteristics associated with the use of social media to seek information regarding chikungunya.
caption.p: 1The variable unemployed includes student, housewife and volunteer. 2Antillean Guilders, 1 ANG = 0.54 USA dollars and 0.47 EUR. 3For two participants the data regarding social media usage was missing. These two participants were excluded from the data analysis (n = 337). 4For eight participants the data regarding social media usage was missing. These eight participants were excluded from the data analysis (n = 331). *Significance was determined at an alpha level of 0.10.
Click here for additional data file.
